name: Bavneet
greetingText: Or should I say neete or MJ or something new ? :P
wishText: You're an amazingly nice person, wishing you the absolute best Bavneet (Neetika). May you have a great year ahead full of success and happiness. Always keep smiling and have fun!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you little neete!! Yay! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. And do some bhangra before sleeping ðŸ˜‚ .
